contents.description: Games, Trivia and image manipulation! We have a meme Generator, text generator and more
contents.name: OcelotBOT
contents.page:
OcelotBOT is a general purpose tool and meme bot.

You can find the command list below, or in discord using !help

Command NameUsage (Without the brackets)
Magic 8-ball!8ball
Achievement Get!!achievement
Wise Advice!advice
Artifical Intelligence!ai
Apex Stats!apex [platform]
User Avatar!avatar <@User>
B-ify!b
Band Name Generator!bandname
Barcode Generator!barcode
So Sad Meme!beatmywife [url]
Bernie Meme!bernie
Big Text Generator!bigtext
Bulge Image!bulge [url]

Chess!chess start <@player>/
Chinese Text!chinese
Christmas Countdown!christmas
